name: Petzl Hirundos Harness - Unisex
description: An ultralight and comfortable option for sport or alpine climbing. It's tricked out with a host of thoughtful features and uses Fuseframe construction to produce a very slim, clean, lightweight design. Bias webbing on the waist and legs plus Dyneema tie-in points are designed to resist wear and provide seasons of use.Fuseframe construction distributes weight over the structure and minimizes pressure points.Fused fabric and foam layers have no crossing seams to create friction zones.DoubleBack aluminum HD buckle has a slim, rounded design that offers good grip and fluid glide on the waist webbing.Fitted elastic leg loops offer freedom of movement.Rear haul loop can also be used to attach a chalk bag.4 equipment loops: rigid in front for quick and easy access to equipment and flexible in the rear to avoid creating pressure points with a backpack.2 integrated Caritool tool holder slots.Reinforced tie-in points.
